description: On Sept. 10, 2025, SpaceX launched 21 satellites from Vandenberg, beginning the SDA’s first Transport Layer constellation for secure U.S. military communications. Built by York Space Systems, the satellites mark the first operational step toward a 126-satellite network linking American forces worldwide with encrypted, laser-based connections.
title: SpaceX Falcon 9 Launches 21 Satellites for US Military’s New Communications Network

description: Beauty in Black Season 2 arrives on Netflix on September 11, 2025. Directed by Tyler Perry, the series stars Crystle Stewart and Taylor Polidore Williams in a dramatic story of power, betrayal, and corruption within the cosmetic industry. Fans can expect twists, emotional conflicts, and strong performances.
title: Beauty in Black Season 2 Is Now Streaming on Netflix: This Is What You Need to Know

description: Tokens linked to Charlie Kirk’s death surged over 53,000 percent in hours, but backlash followed with a protest token and an X community condemning the trend. Experts warn that such coins remain speculative, with Binance noting 97 percent of memecoins fail shortly after launch, raising collapse risks.
title: Experts Warn Against Crypto Tokens Linked to Charlie Kirk Amidst Backlash, Volatility

description: Flipkart's biggest Big Billion Days Sale Deal Yet? The iPhone 16 Pro to be available with almost flat Rs. 50,000 discount.
title: Forget iPhone 17 Pro, Get the iPhone 16 Pro Max for Under Rs. 90,000 in Flipkart's Big Billion Days Sale

description: HMD Vibe 5G, HMD 101 4G, and HMD 102 4G phones have launched in India. The Vibe 5G is a budget 5G phone with a 50-megapixel dual rear camera, 8-megapixel front camera, 5,000mAh battery, and a one-year replacement guarantee. The HMD 101 4G and 102 4G have a 2-inch QQVGA display, 1,000mAh battery, and colour-matched keypad, with the 102 4G adding a QVGA 2-megapixel rear camera with flash.
title: HMD Vibe 5G With 50-Megapixel Camera Launched in India Alongside HMD 101 4G, HMD 102 4G: Price, Features

description: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025 is set to kick off on September 23. However, the sale event will begin a day early for the Flipkart Black and VIP members. Weeks before the commencement of the sale event, the company has revealed the deal price of the iPhone 14 in India. The 2022 announced iPhone 14 to sell at under Rs. 40,000.
title: iPhone 14 Under Rs. 40,000: Flipkart's Big Billion Days Sale Deal Revealed

description: The iPhone 17 series maintains the same 1,000-charge-cycle rating as the iPhone 16 lineup, offering high energy efficiency but no improvement in long-term battery durability. Apple lags behind Samsung in battery longevity, while the Galaxy S25 series and select devices offer up to 2,000 charge cycles. The European iPhone models differ slightly from US versions, with some featuring a physical SIM tray and slightly smaller batteries, though battery chemistry and overall performance remain unchanged.
title: iPhone 17 Series Still Behind Samsung Smartphones in Battery Longevity: Report

description: Itel Super 26 Ultra has been launched in select markets like Nigeria and Bangladesh. It comes with a 6.78-inch 3D curved AMOLED display and runs on a Unisoc T7300 processor. It has a dual rear camera unit and a 6,000mAh battery with 18W charging support.
title: Itel Super 26 Ultra Launched With 6.8-Inch Display, 6,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Netflix’s hit reality series Love Is Blind returns with Season 9, streaming October 1, 2025. Shot in Denver, the season brings 32 diverse contestants, guided by hosts Nick and Vanessa Lachey. With high drama, emotional twists, and blind engagements, this season promises another binge-worthy journey into love and heartbreak.
title: Love Is Blind Season 9: Release Date, Cast, Trailer, and What to Expect

description: NASA has certified a helicopter-based lander training course in Colorado’s Rocky Mountains to prepare Artemis astronauts for Moon missions. The high-altitude terrain creates lunar-like visual illusions, forcing pilots to master landings in dusty, slope-filled conditions. Over two dozen astronauts have now trained in this challenging, realistic simulation.
title: NASA Uses Rocky Mountain Helicopter Drills to Prepare Astronauts for Artemis Moon Missions

description: NASA’s Perseverance rover has uncovered iron-rich minerals in Jezero Crater rocks that on Earth often link to microbial activity. The discovery suggests Mars’ lake basin may have been more hospitable than thought. Still, scientists caution that only Earth-based analysis can confirm whether these are true biosignatures.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Rover Finds Potential Signs of Life in Mars Rock Sample

description: Blinkit has announced that it will deliver Apple’s iPhone 17 series within 10 minutes of purchase once sales begin. The Zomato-owned hyperlocal delivery platform will cover the entire lineup, iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max, offering near-instant access to Apple’s newly launched flagship smartphones.
title: Need the iPhone 17 Series on Launch Day? Blinkit Promises 10-Minute Delivery

description: LIGO has detected GW250114, the loudest gravitational-wave signal yet, marking ten years since its first breakthrough. The event confirmed Einstein’s relativity, Hawking’s horizon theorem, and Kerr’s spinning black hole model. By capturing the merger of two 32-solar-mass black holes, scientists gained the clearest view of black hole physics, offering new insights into gravity’s quantum links.
title: New Black Hole Merger Gives Clearest Test of Einstein’s Relativity

description: NoiseFit Endeavour Pro was launched in India on Thursday with a 1.5-inch AMOLED display and a 5 ATM water resistance rating. It has GPS connectivity and is claimed to have a battery life of up to 10 days. The NoiseFit Endeavour Pro comes in two colour options with an introductory price of Rs 9,999.
title: NoiseFit Endeavour Pro Launched in India With 1.5-Inch AMOLED Display, 10-Day Battery Life

description: Only Murders in the Building Season 5 has now landed on JioHotstar. It stars Selena Gomez, Steve Martin, and Martin Short in the lead roles. Watch now.
title: Only Murders in the Building Season 5 Now Streaming Online: Know When and Where to Watch

description: Top streaming platforms are gearing up with some binge-worthy movies and web series where there’s romance, comedy, horror, action, and thrill. Know what’s buzzing this week.
title: OTT Releases This Week (Sept 8 - Sept 14): Rajinikanth's Coolie, Saiyaara, a New Tamannaah Bhatia Series, and More

description: Police Police, the latest Tamil drama series, streams on JioHotstar via OTTplay Premium starting September 19. Starring Mirchi Senthil, Jayaseelan Thangavel, and Shabana Shahjahan, the show blends police action, comedy, and romance. With strong characters and a weekly release, it’s expected to attract Tamil drama fans.
title: Police Police OTT Release: Know When, Where to Watch the Tamil Crime Drama Series

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE pricing in India has not been revealed by the South Korean tech giant yet. However, the company did announce the US pricing of the phone during its September 4 launch event. Now, a tipster has revealed the possible India pricing of the Samsung Galaxy S25 FE’s base variant, suggesting that it could be priced similarly to its predecessor.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Price in India Leaked; Might Be Similar to Price of Galaxy S24 FE at Launch

description: Sony has launched the PlayStation Family mobile app for parents to manage their children's gaming experience. The app, available on iOS and Android, will share real-time notifications on gaming activity, allow parents to set content restrictions and playtime limits, and restrict social features.
title: Sony Launches PlayStation Family App on iOS, Android for Parental Controls on Gaming Activity

description: October 2025 will feature a Harvest Supermoon, appearing larger and brighter than usual. Known for its cultural importance and beauty, this full moon offers the best views at moonrise in open skies. Skywatchers can enjoy a rare and memorable moment.
title: Supermoon 2025: When Is the Next Full Moon Lighting Up the Sky

description: Directed by Akiva Schaffer, The Naked Guy is an action comedy movie that follows a bumbling detective embarking on a mission to safeguard Queen on her LA tour.
title: The Naked Gun OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch the Liam Neeson Starrer Online

description: Union Minister Jayant Chaudhary and his wife Charu Singh have declared cryptocurrency holdings worth Rs. 43 lakh in their latest asset disclosure. This is the second year in a row they reported such investments, marking one of the rare instances of Indian ministers openly holding digital assets.
title: Union Minister Jayant Chaudhary, Wife Disclose Over Rs. 43 Lakh in Crypto Assets

description: Vivo X300 series rumours have been surfacing online for a while. Expected to launch in October as the successor to last year’s Vivo X200 series, this year’s lineup is said to include the Vivo X300 and Vivo X300 Pro. An executive of the Chinese smartphone maker has now confirmed a few specifications of the Vivo X300 Pro, along with the handset’s performance numbers. Moreover, the Vivo executive has also shared the display size of the standard Vivo X300.
title: Vivo X300 Series Key Specifications, Performance Upgrades Revealed Ahead of Anticipated Launch

description: Xiaomi is gearing up to sell the Moaan InkPalm Mini Plus 2 e-reader in China. It comes with a 5.84-inch display, 6GB of RAM, and up to 512GB of internal storage. It features a Rockchip RK3566 processor and runs on Android 14. It has a front-lit display that supports adjustable colour temperature models and offers up to 32 nits of brightness.
title: Xiaomi Moaan InkPalm Mini Plus 2 E-Reader Launched With 5.84-Inch Display, 512GB Storage

description: Nintendo has announced a new Direct showcase for upcoming Switch and Switch 2 games. The Nintendo Direct showcase will be livestreamed on YouTube on September 12, just a day before the 40th anniversary of the first Super Mario Bros. game.
title: Nintendo Direct Livestream Confirmed for This Week, Will Be Roughly 60 Minutes Long

description: The Swarovski Edition Motorola Razr 60 and Moto Buds Loop are now available in India with the same specifications as their standard versions. The Razr 60 features a quilted leather-like finish with 35 Swarovski crystals, including a 26-facet crystal on the hinge, crystal-accented buttons, and a crossbody case. The Moto Buds Loop sport a jewellery-inspired design with Swarovski crystals embedded in the body.
title: Motorola Razr 60, Moto Buds Loop Swarovski Edition Go on Sale in India: Price, Offers

description: Meta said Instagram Reels has become India’s top short-video viewing platform on Thursday, citing results from a user survey conducted to mark the fifth anniversary of the launch of the Reels tab in the country. The company claimed Indian users prefer Reels over rivals and that short-video consumption now surpasses traditional TV and OTT platforms in viewing frequency.
title: Instagram Reels Viewership Surpasses TV in India, Meta Report Claims

description: Oppo F31 series is confirmed to launch in India in mid-September. Now, the company has made the microsite for the upcoming Oppo F-series lineup live, revealing its key specifications. It will be powered by a Snapdragon chipset. Apart from the specifications, the company has also shared the benchmark scores of the Oppo F31 series.
title: Oppo F31 Series Key Specifications Confirmed Ahead of September 15 India Launch

description: Amazon has officially expanded its instant delivery service, Amazon Now, to Mumbai. The service, which is already available in Bengaluru and Delhi, allows customers to order thousands of daily essentials in under 10 minutes. It has also set up over 100 micro-fulfilment centres across the three cities.
title: Amazon Now Expands to Mumbai With 10-Minute Deliveries for Groceries, Essentials

description: Acer Nitro V15 (2025) with up to Intel Core i7 13th Gen processor has been launched in India, the company announced on Thursday. The new gaming laptop features a plastic chassis and is available in a single colourway. It also sports a 15.6-inch full-HD display. It is available in two processor variants via Acer’s retail stores, the official company website, Amazon, and Flipkart.
title: Acer Nitro V15 (2025) Launched in India With Up To Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 GPU: Price, Specifications

description: Amazon has started working on its first augmented reality (AR) glasses, as per a report. The tech giant is said to be working on two new AR glasses, which are said to take on Meta Platforms’ Orion, which were unveiled during the Meta Connect 2024 event in September last year. Moreover, Amazon’s rumoured AR wearables have allegedly been internally codenamed Jayhawk. They are said to feature microphones, speakers, a single camera unit, and a full-colour display.
title: Amazon Said to Be Developing AR Glasses With Camera, Display and Speakers

description: Arm C1 CPU cluster was introduced on Wednesday by the semiconductor giant. The new CPU series was unveiled alongside the Mali G1 series GPUs, both designed to handle artificial intelligence (AI) workflows and more demanding tasks. The Arm C1 CPU family introduces different tiers of processors, ranging from the more powerful C1-Ultra to the smaller C1-Nano cores.
title: Arm C1 CPU Series Announced With Faster On-Device AI Performance and Better Efficiency for Smartphones

description: Bitcoin held steady at $114,000 (roughly Rs. 1 crore) on Thursday as softer US producer price data at 2.6 percent boosted hopes of a Fed rate cut next week. Analysts highlighted that consistent inflows into spot Bitcoin ETFs, nearly $1 billion so far this week, also supported sentiment. Ethereum surged to $4,400 (roughly Rs. 3.8 lakh), while major altcoins, including Solana, Dogecoin, and XRP, saw muted moves as traders awaited key macroeconomic cues.
title: Bitcoin Crosses $114,000 as US PPI Report Lifts Rate Cut Hopes

description: iPhone Air was launched earlier this week with a 5.6mm build. Now, Apple CEO Tim Cook, along with Molly Anderson, VP of Industrial Design, and Alan Dye, VP of Human Interface Design, shared the design philosphpy for the new iPhone Air in an interview.
title: iPhone Air Design Vision Explained by Apple CEO Tim Cook, Other Executives

description: Sony has announced the slate of games joining PS Plus Game Catalog in September. The game subscription service will add WWE 2K25, Persona 5 Tactica, Green Hell, Fate/Samurai Remnant, Crow Country, The Invincible, and Conscript this month. All games will be playable from September 16.
title: PS Plus Game Catalog Adds WWE 2K25, Persona 5 Tactica, Green Hell and More in September

description: The Samsung Galaxy F17 5G has been launched in India with a 6.7-inch 90Hz Infinity-U Super AMOLED display with Gorilla Glass Victus protection, a 5nm Exynos 1330 SoC and One UI 7 with six years of OS and security updates. The phone sports a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit and a 13-megapixel front camera. It has a 5,000mAh battery with 25W fast charging, 5G support, an IP54 rating, and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor. It has similar features to the Galaxy A17 5G.
title: Samsung Galaxy F17 5G Launched in India With 5,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera: Price, Features

description: The Galaxy S26 Ultra may feature a 12-megapixel 3x telephoto camera, cropped to 10-megapixel, with a 1/3.94-inch sensor and 1.0µm pixels, which is smaller than the S25 Ultra’s 12-megapixel Sony IMX754 sensor with a 1/3.52-inch size and 1.12µm pixels. Though the difference seems minor, sensor and pixel size affect light capture, detail, and low-light performance. The company is tipped to not incorporate any changes to this as the device nears mass production.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Tipped to Launch With Downgraded 3x Telephoto Camera

description: YouTube has begun rolling out multi-language audio, a creator-focused feature tested over the past two years. The tool allows creators to add dubbed versions of their videos in multiple languages without separate uploads or channels. Available globally, the feature requires manual audio track uploads, as YouTube does not automatically generate dubbed versions.
title: YouTube Begins Global Rollout of Multi-Language Audio Dubbing Feature for Creators

description: Google has rolled out a quality-of-life update to the Gemini app, making small interface adjustments. The biggest change is a redesigned prompt bar. Previously displayed as a closed rectangular box, it now uses an open-box style with only a top border. This layout frees up space, letting users fit more characters in one line.
title: Google Updates Gemini App’s Prompt Bar With an Open-Box Design

description: Realme P3 Lite 5G will be launched later this week. Ahead of the formal launch, the price details of the handset appeared on Flipkart. The e-commerce website has listed the Realme P3 Lite 5G in 4GB and 6GB RAM options with a 'coming soon' tag.
title: Realme P3 Lite 5G Price in India Revealed Ahead of Launch on September 13

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro, which is said to replace the standard model in the company’s S-series lineup, might receive a subtle design change. As per a report, a new CAD render of the alleged smartphone has surfaced, revealing a pill-shaped raised camera module that houses the three cameras in a vertical alignment.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro Design Renders Reveal Pill-Shaped Camera Island, Blue Colourway

description: Xiaomi 15 was launched in China in October last year. Its supposed successor, dubbed Xiaomi 16, is expected to launch earlier than its predecessor, in late September. The leaks regarding the Chinese smartphone maker’s rumoured handset have been surfacing for a while. Now, a tipster has shared the key specifications of the upcoming Xiaomi 16.
title: Xiaomi 16 Key Specifications Including 7,000mAh Battery, 120Hz LTPO OLED Display Leaked, Could Launch Soon

description: Xiaomi has opened signups for HyperOS 3 beta testers, with applications accepted only via the Xiaomi Community app. Selected users will receive early OTA updates of the build. A teaser hints at a possible global rollout on September 24. HyperOS 3 was first released in China in August for the Xiaomi 15 series, Redmi K80 series, and select tablets, with further expansion planned in October.
title: Xiaomi Opens HyperOS 3 Global Beta Programme to All Users: Here's How to Sign Up

description: Italian astronomers using the Hubble Space Telescope have discovered a white dwarf orbiting a blue straggler star in the globular cluster 47 Tucanae, located 15,300 light-years away. The rare system, among the youngest detected, sheds light on stellar mass transfer and offers vital clues to the evolution of binary stars in dense clusters.
title: NASA Hubble Space Telescope Uncovers One of the Youngest Known Blue Straggler–White Dwarf Systems
